Text: The attached Preliminary Information Gas supply requirements Years and Time Schedule are for your planning purposes I would greatly appreciate your comments on how we could structure a gas purchase agreement with your firm in terms of contract length and pricing formula I look forward to hearing from you for further information and your comments prior to August INVITATIONBIDgassupplydoc Gas Supply Contract Requirementsxls Time Scheduledoc INVITATIONBIDgassupplydoc Gas Supply Contract Requirementsxls Time Scheduledoc

LONG TERM GAS SUPPLY RFQ DELAYDue to the changing setuation with EPNG the City of LAS CRUCES and RIO GRANDE are postponing the RFQ from the Aug date as scheduled You will be informed of a new schedule in the near future JIM WHITE
RFP QualificationsKim I just wanted to touch base to see if you received the RFP I am trying to see who is interested in our gas service at this time for next September Thanks Jim
